name: Fun Pet Animal Run Game - The Best Running Games For Boys And Girls For Free

description:
+++SUPER FUN ANIMAL RACE GAME!!+++

You will love running these awesome animals around the city!! They need YOU to help them get their exercise and collect gold coins!!

1) Choose from awesome dogs, cats, turtles, owls and more!!!
2) Collect Coins and Power-ups
3) Never-ending Game Play
4) Easy enough for kids but addicting and fun enough for adults!!!
